channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Pennsylvania State University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Meta-Reinforcement Learning with Universal Policy Adaptation: Provable Near-Optimality under All-task Optimum Comparator
item.description: Provable near-optimality in meta-RL is achieved using a novel bilevel optimization framework and universal policy adaptation algorithm.

item.title: pFedClub: Controllable Heterogeneous Model Aggregation for Personalized Federated Learning
item.description: pFedClub: Controllable heterogeneous model aggregation boosts personalized federated learning by generating reasonable-sized, personalized models, significantly cutting computational costs.
